features: Stay fresh all day long with an intoxicating mix of mango and fresh-cut pineapple in Nectarine Secret Invisible Solid Antiperspirant and Deodorant
Start dry and stay dry with this invisible solid that goes on dry with a smooth, even application
Sweat and odor are no match for its 48 hours of odor control and wetness protection
This unique formula helps stop odor before it starts
Stay dry, odor-free, and fresh with Secret Invisible Solid Antiperspirant and Deodorant, Nectarine scent
body.description: Product Description Designed with scents that last, the Secret Fresh Collection has scents you love from our former Scent Expressions and Destinations collections. Secret Invisible Solid goes on dry and stays dry with a smooth, even application. This unique formula features proprietary sweat-activated technology, which captures odor and releases fragrance. The sweat-activated technology uses odor-neutralizing molecules to trap odor, lock it away, and then replace it with fresh scent to keep you smelling clean and fresh all day long. Secret Invisible Solid helps stop underarm odor before it starts with 48-hour odor control and wetness protection. From the Manufacturer Be fresh and fabulous! Express yourself with Secret Scent Expressions – fun, bold scents for strong, all-day odor protection. Each scent is unique, just like you and your friends. Its tried-and-true pH-balanced formula is designed to protect against odor and wetness to keep you feeling dry and smelling sweet. Find the right one to fit your mood and personality! Invisible Solid: Protection that goes on dry.Also Try...For a total scent experience, use with Scent Expressions Pasión de Tango Aerosol Body Spray.Choose Your Perfect Secret Scent Expressions ScentSo Very SummerberryGet that summer feeling any time you want with bursts of berry scentPasión de TangoDelicate hints of exotic mango infused with crisp, sweet pineapple make you feel the passion of tangoOoh-la-la LavenderLovely and light, notes of lavender leave a lasting impressionCocoa Butter KissA tropical, sun-kissed scent that's warm and invitingTruth or PearA fresh, crisp pear scent that's full of energy and attitudePassionista FruitWear a slice of something sweet with this fruity, fun, and flirty scentVa Va VanillaVa va voom! Here's a scent that says vanilla and means itGreat Protection Comes in Many FormsSolidThe original, tried and trusted protection Smooth SolidReduces irritation caused by shavingInvisible SolidProtection that goes on dryAdvanced SolidPrescription strength wetness protection with skin conditionersClear GelGoes on clear, stays on clear with no white marksRoll-OnCool and refreshing, trusted protectionAerosolSpray-on protectionFind the Right Secret for YouClinical StrengthPrescription-strength protection to keep you dry all day long. Available in Advanced Solid.Outlast48-hour protection that stops odors before they start. Available in Invisible Solid, Clear Gel.Outlast & Olay48-hour odor protection with skin-soothing Olay conditioners. Available in Smooth Solid.Fresh EffectsAll-day protection featuring fresh scents inspired by nature. Available in Invisible Solid and Body Mist.OriginalTried and trusted protection against odor and wetness. Available in Invisible Solid, Wide Solid, Roll-On, and Aerosol.Natural MineralA more natural way to neutralize odor. Available in Invisible Solid.Scent ExpressionsExpress yourself with fun, bold scents—now with even better protection! Available in Invisible Solid, Clear Gel, and Body Splash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will always buy!
reviews.reviewText: I have tried all kinds of deodorant, from natural to cream to solid sticks. However, I always gravitate back to the lavender clear gel deodorant from Secret. It lasts the longest for me and I love the fresh scent. Of the deodorant types I have tried, it also has the least level of transfer onto my clothes (as long as you wait for it to dry)!Also - this is a larger size and lasts longer. I appreciate that as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Slides on easily, doesn’t burn (even after a recent‘shave’), and I’ve rarely had a situation (and I’m out in the sun and/or working out a bit) where it didn’t‘Get the Job Done’!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Secret Deodorant invisible solid powder fresh is the best deodorant I have ever used! After using other deodorants and antiperspirants Secret is the only one that fights odor and keeps me dry in the hot sweaty summer months. I refuse to use any other deodorant! I LOVE SECRET!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Secret is Out!
reviews.reviewText: Oh, Secret Deodorant, you sly little companion in my daily battle against unpleasant odors. You claim to keep me fresh and dry, but can you really keep a secret? Well, let's dive into this fragrant adventure and find out!First things first, the packaging. It's like a secret agent disguised as a deodorant stick. Sleek, slender, and covertly hiding in my bathroom drawer. I almost expected it to come with a tiny magnifying glass and a mission briefing. If only it could whisper classified information into my ear, like, "Agent Freshness, your mission is to stay odor-free all day. Good luck!"Now, let's talk about the scent. Ah, the sweet mystery of Secret Deodorant. It's like a clandestine blend of flowers and confidence. Every time I raise my arms, I imagine a bouquet of roses and lilies bursting forth, overpowering any whiff of uncertainty. It's like having a secret weapon against body odor. The scent is so alluring; I almost feel like I should be sneaking around, undercover, on a top-secret mission to sniff out freshness.But does it pass the ultimate test—the battle against sweat? Well, I'm happy to report that Secret Deodorant is as reliable as a secret agent on a mission. It keeps my underarms drier than the Sahara Desert on a scorching summer day. Even during intense workouts or nerve-wracking situations, I can trust Secret to keep me cool and collected, as if I have my own personal air-conditioning system under my arms.Now, I must admit, there is one tiny quirk I've noticed. Sometimes, Secret Deodorant can be a bit too secretive. Just when I need it the most, I find myself struggling with the invisible shield it creates. It's like a magician's trick, making my underarms disappear from the world. But hey, I suppose it's a small price to pay for staying fresh and odor-free throughout the day.In conclusion, Secret Deodorant is the stealthy sidekick every armpit deserves. Its mysterious allure, covert protection, and ability to keep secrets (like how many times I've rewatched my favorite TV show) make it a top choice for those seeking freshness and a dash of intrigue in their lives. So go ahead, embrace the secrecy, and let Secret Deodorant be your trusty accomplice in the quest for underarm freshness!Disclaimer: No spies were harmed in the making of this review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the light scent but expensive
reviews.reviewText: I'm pregnant and absolutely love the light scent. I can smell it just fine, but it's not overpowering and doesn't make me nauseous. I can smell it perfectly fine, but my sister we r says she can hardly smell anything. I'd call ut a step above unscented.Price... expensive. $16 so it's more than $5 each *sigh*. Hopefully I can find this at a store for cheaper when I get past my first trimester.Secret seems to be the only deodorant that works for me. I'm a heavy sweater, like I sweat in the middle of a snow storm heavy. It's ridiculous. But this one hasn't worn out on me midday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product,great value.Works as well as the more expensive clinical deodorants.

reviews.reviewText: Smells amazing and lasts for so long. I wish there was a perfume version. It smells so yummy

El olor es increíble y dura todo el día, no te abandona 😁

und endlich wieder bei Amazon zu einem akzeptablen Preis zu bekommen.Hält Stunden und duftet herrlich nach Vanille. Bestes Deo für mich, auch an sehr heißen Tagen.Ein Stick hält bei mir ein paar Monate, auch wenn ich ihn nicht sparsam verwende.
Amoooo ess antiperspirante, com certeza irei comprar outras vezes é indico super.
